data.message: All of you that didn’t like it like he said you either with or against you can easily unfollow or un like this page but yet here you are trolling. #GOAT #Eminem #Cypher #truth

replies.message: Joel Sanchez I know he is trust me we all know he is he is more interested in making people aware he is the president than trying to fix shit

Just a thought for you, Carlos.  It's possible to like the man's music and respect his unbelievable talent but still disagree with his uneducated political opinions.  And I'm not even a big fan of Trump.

Matt Robertson your opinion is that his political view is uneducated because you don’t agree with it? I was an Obama supporter but acknowledge he made some mistakes as POTUS. And can I ask why you think his opinion is uneducated?
